verses.verse: The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%> Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> and Merari. <S%H4847><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath: <S%H6955><s%> Amram, <S%H6019><s%> Izhar, <S%H3324><s%> and Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and Uzziel. <S%H5816><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Amram: <S%H6019><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and Miriam. <S%H4813><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron: <S%H175><s%> Nadab, <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>
Eleazar <S%H499><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Phinehas, <S%H6372><s%> Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Abishua, <S%H50><s%>
and Abishua <S%H50><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Bukki, <S%H1231><s%> and Bukki <S%H1231><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Uzzi, <S%H5813><s%>
and Uzzi <S%H5813><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Zerahiah, <S%H2228><s%> and Zerahiah <S%H2228><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Meraioth, <S%H4812><s%>
Meraioth <S%H4812><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Amariah, <S%H568><s%> and Amariah <S%H568><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Ahitub, <S%H285><s%>
and Ahitub <S%H285><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Zadok, <S%H6659><s%> and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Ahimaaz, <S%H290><s%>
and Ahimaaz <S%H290><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Azariah, <S%H5838><s%> and Azariah <S%H5838><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Johanan, <S%H3110><s%>

and Johanan <S%H3110><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Azariah, <S%H5838><s%> (he it is who executed the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office in the house <S%H1004><s%> that Solomon <S%H8010><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>),
and Azariah <S%H5838><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Amariah, <S%H568><s%> and Amariah <S%H568><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Ahitub, <S%H285><s%>
and Ahitub <S%H285><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Zadok, <S%H6659><s%> and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shallum, <S%H7967><s%>
and Shallum <S%H7967><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Hilkiah, <S%H2518><s%> and Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Azariah, <S%H5838><s%>
and Azariah <S%H5838><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Seraiah, <S%H8304><s%> and Seraiah <S%H8304><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jehozadak; <S%H3087><s%>

Jehozadak <S%H3087><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> into captivity, <S%H3068><s%> when Yahweh carried away <S%H1540><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar. <S%H5019><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%> Gershom, <S%H1647><s%> Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> and Merari. <S%H4847><s%>
These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom: <S%H1647><s%> Libni <S%H3845><s%> and Shimei. <S%H8096><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> were Amram, <S%H6019><s%> and Izhar, <S%H3324><s%> and Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and Uzziel. <S%H5816><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari: <S%H4847><s%> Mahli <S%H4249><s%> and Mushi. <S%H4187><s%> These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' households.
Of Gershom: <S%H1647><s%> Libni <S%H3845><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Jahath <S%H3189><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Zimmah <S%H2155><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Joah <S%H3098><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Iddo <S%H5714><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Zerah <S%H2226><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Jeatherai <S%H2979><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath: <S%H6955><s%> Amminadab <S%H5992><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Korah <S%H7141><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Assir <S%H617><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Elkanah <S%H511><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Ebiasaph <S%H43><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Assir <S%H617><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Tahath <S%H8480><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Uriel <S%H222><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah: <S%H511><s%> Amasai, <S%H6022><s%> and Ahimoth. <S%H287><s%>
As for Elkanah, <S%H511><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah: <S%H511><s%> Zophai <S%H6689><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Nahath <S%H5184><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Eliab <S%H446><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Jeroham <S%H3395><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Elkanah <S%H511><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Samuel: <S%H8050><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> Joel, <S%H2059><s%> and the second Abijah. <S%H29><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari: <S%H4847><s%> Mahli, <S%H4249><s%> Libni <S%H3845><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Shimei <S%H8096><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Uzzah <S%H5798><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Shimea <S%H8092><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Haggiah <S%H2293><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Asaiah <S%H6222><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

These are they whom David <S%H1732><s%> set <S%H5975><s%> over the service <S%H3027><s%> of song <S%H7892><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> after that the ark <S%H727><s%> had rest. <S%H4494><s%>

They ministered <S%H8334><s%> with song <S%H7892><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> until Solomon <S%H8010><s%> had built <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> and they waited <S%H5975><s%> on their office <S%H5656><s%> according to their order. <S%H4941><s%>

These are those who waited, <S%H5975><s%> and their sons. <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Kohathites: <S%H6956><s%> Heman <S%H1968><s%> the singer, <S%H7891><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joel, <S%H3100><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Samuel, <S%H8050><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah, <S%H511><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham, <S%H3395><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eliel, <S%H447><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Toah, <S%H8430><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuph, <S%H6689><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah, <S%H511><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mahath, <S%H4287><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amasai, <S%H6022><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah, <S%H511><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joel, <S%H3100><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azariah, <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zephaniah, <S%H6846><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Tahath, <S%H8480><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Assir, <S%H617><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebiasaph, <S%H43><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar, <S%H3324><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

His brother <S%H251><s%> Asaph, <S%H623><s%> who stood <S%H5975><s%> on his right hand, <S%H3225><s%> even Asaph <S%H623><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah, <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimea, <S%H8092><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael, <S%H4317><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baaseiah, <S%H1202><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchijah, <S%H4441><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ethni, <S%H867><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adaiah, <S%H5718><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ethan, <S%H387><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zimmah, <S%H2155><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei, <S%H8096><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jahath, <S%H3189><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom, <S%H1647><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi. <S%H3878><s%>

On the left hand <S%H8040><s%> their brothers <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari: <S%H4847><s%> Ethan <S%H387><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kishi, <S%H7029><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abdi, <S%H5660><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malluch, <S%H4409><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amaziah, <S%H558><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah, <S%H2518><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amzi, <S%H557><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bani, <S%H1137><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shemer, <S%H8106><s%>
the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mahli, <S%H4249><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mushi, <S%H4187><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi. <S%H3878><s%>
Their brothers <S%H251><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were appointed <S%H5414><s%> for all the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

But Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> offered <S%H6999><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense, <S%H7004><s%> for all the work <S%H4399><s%> of the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place, <S%H3722><s%> and to make atonement for Israel, <S%H3478><s%> according to all that Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had commanded. <S%H6680><s%>
These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron: <S%H175><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Abishua <S%H50><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Bukki <S%H1231><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Uzzi <S%H5813><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Zerahiah <S%H2228><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Meraioth <S%H4812><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Amariah <S%H568><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Ahitub <S%H285><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Zadok <S%H6659><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Ahimaaz <S%H290><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

Now these are their dwelling places <S%H4186><s%> according to their encampments <S%H2918><s%> in their borders: <S%H1366><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> (for theirs was the first lot <S%H1486><s%>),
to them they gave <S%H5414><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and its suburbs <S%H4054><s%> around it; <S%H5439><s%>
but the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and its villages, <S%H2691><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> to Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh. <S%H3312><s%>

To the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> Hebron; <S%H2275><s%> Libnah <S%H3841><s%> also with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Jattir, <S%H3492><s%> and Eshtemoa <S%H851><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
and Hilen <S%H2432><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Debir <S%H1688><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
and Ashan <S%H6228><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Beth Shemesh <S%H1053><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%>

and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Geba <S%H1387><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Allemeth <S%H5964><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> with its suburbs. <S%H4054><s%> All their cities <S%H5892><s%> throughout their families <S%H4940><s%> were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

To the rest of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> were given by lot, <S%H1486><s%> out <S%H3498><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe, <S%H4294><s%> out of the half-tribe, <S%H2677><s%> <S%H4294><s%> the half <S%H4276><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

To the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom, <S%H1647><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

To the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> were given by lot, <S%H1486><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

They gave <S%H5414><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> which are mentioned <S%H7121><s%> by name. <S%H8034><s%>
Some of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> had cities <S%H5892><s%> of their borders <S%H1366><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

They gave <S%H5414><s%> to them the cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> Gezer <S%H1507><s%> also with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
and Jokmeam <S%H3361><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Beth Horon <S%H1032><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
and Aijalon <S%H357><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Gath Rimmon <S%H1667><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%>

and out of the half-tribe <S%H4276><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Aner <S%H6063><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Bileam <S%H1109><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> for the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath. <S%H6955><s%>

To the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom <S%H1647><s%> were given, <S%H4940><s%> out of the family of the half-tribe <S%H2677><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%>
and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Daberath <S%H1705><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
and Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Anem <S%H6046><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%>
and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> Mashal <S%H4913><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Abdon <S%H5658><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
and Hukok <S%H2712><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Rehob <S%H7340><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%>

and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> in Galilee <S%H1551><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Hammon <S%H2540><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%> with its suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

To the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the Levites, <S%H1121><s%> the sons of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> were given, <S%H4294><s%> out of the tribe of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> Rimmono <S%H7417><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Tabor <S%H8396><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%>

and beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> on the east side <S%H5676><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> were given them, <S%H4294><s%> out of the tribe of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Bezer <S%H1221><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Jahzah <S%H3096><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
and Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Mephaath <S%H4158><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%>
and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
and Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Jazer <S%H3270><s%> with its suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>
